Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the interior is lightly covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394687) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394687)
